Pre-Game Insights: Both sides have scored three goals each at the finals, and this last eight tie could be decided by a lone goal, with the DRC eking out a marginal win over Guinea.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Congo DR have made it to the Africa Cup of Nations quarter-finals without winning a game in regulation time
Guinea progressed to the knockout rounds as the competition's best third-placed side
Edo Kayembe has missed every DRC game at the Cup of Nations
Gael Kakuta was a significant miss for the Leopards in the round of 16
Others: Congo DR possible starting lineup: M'Pasi; Kalulu, Mbemba, Batubinsika, Masuaku; Pickel, Moutoussamy; Bongonda, Kakuta, Wissa; Bakambu
Guinea possible starting lineup: Kone; Diakite, Diakhaby, Jeanvier, Sylla; Konate, Diawara; Guilavogui, Keita, Sylla; Guirassy
